productLinks.title: Product Links
productLinks.subtitle: Sometimes, during a conversation, the chatbot might share a product link — for example, an image of an item you can buy. This could happen if you ask for it directly, or if the topic naturally inspires a suggestion. Click "Add Link" to add new product URLs.
productLinks.modalSubtitle: This can be any site the chatbot should recommend

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create an account via Google, Facebook or email

step3.title: Connect Instagram
step3.description: Connect your Instagram account and activate the bot

footer.tagline: AI-powered automation for your Instagram interactions. Let the bot do the work for you.

terms.title: Terms of Use

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to rudolpho-chat! These Terms of Use govern the use of our AI-powered automation service for Instagram interactions. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

functionality.title: 2.1 How It Works
functionality.content: rudolpho-chat is an AI-powered platform that allows you to create automated responses to Instagram direct messages and comments. Our service works as follows:
features: Persona Creation: You create a digital personality with specific characteristics, communication style, and response patterns
AI Integration: Our artificial intelligence automatically generates appropriate responses based on your defined persona
Instagram Automation: The service can automatically respond to incoming messages and comments
Customizable Settings: You maintain full control over all automated responses

metaInteraction.title: 2.2 Interaction with Meta Platforms
metaInteraction.content: Our service interacts with Instagram (a Meta platform) through official APIs:
features: Data Retrieval: We only retrieve data necessary for providing our service (e.g., incoming messages, comments)
Data Transmission: Responses are sent to recipients via the Instagram API
Data Security: All data transmissions are encrypted and conducted over secure connections
Consent Requirement: We only access your Instagram data when you have explicitly approved it

independence.title: 3.1 Independence from Meta
independence.content: Important Notice: rudolpho-chat is a completely independent service and is neither offered, sponsored, nor operated by Meta Platforms, Inc. We are an independent company with our own business models and technologies.

disclaimer.title: 3.2 Disclaimer Regarding Meta
disclaimer.content: Meta Platforms, Inc. is not responsible for:
items: The operation, functionality, or availability of our service
The content of responses generated through our service
Technical issues or failures of our system
Our business practices or obligations to users
Privacy or security aspects of our service
disclaimer.conclusion: We act as an independent service provider and are solely responsible for all aspects of our service.

allowed.title: 4.1 Permitted Use
allowed.content: You may only use our service for lawful purposes:
items: Automating your own Instagram interactions
Creating personas for your personal or business purposes
Use in compliance with Instagram's Terms of Use

prohibited.title: 4.2 Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: The following uses are not permitted:
items: Violation of Instagram's Terms of Use or Community Guidelines
Spam, harassment, or abusive behavior
Use for illegal or harmful purposes
Attempting to compromise the security of our system
Sharing your account with third parties

free.title: 5.1 Free Use
free.content: We offer a free plan with limited features:
items: 20 automated messages per month
Basic persona creation
Standard response templates

pro.title: 5.2 Pro Subscription
pro.content: Our Pro plan offers extended features:
items: Unlimited automated messages
Enhanced AI responses
Priority support
Custom persona creation
pro.price: Price: €10 per month, cancelable at any time

privacy.title: 6. Privacy and Security
privacy.content: The protection of your data is our top priority. All details about data processing can be found in our
privacy.security: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data and ensure compliance with all applicable data protection regulations.

liability.title: 7. Liability and Warranty
liability.content: Our service is provided 'as is'. We make no warranty for uninterrupted availability or error-free functionality.
liability.limitation: Our liability is limited to the amount you paid for our service in the last 12 months.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms of Use
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these Terms of Use as needed. Significant changes will be notified to you by email. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: You can cancel your account at any time. Upon cancellation, all your data will be deleted within 30 days, unless legal retention periods apply.
termination.rights: We reserve the right to block or delete accounts that violate these Terms of Use.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.content: You can also delete your data before cancellation. A detailed guide can be found on our

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Use, you can reach us at:

legal.title: 11. Legal Basis
legal.content: These Terms of Use are subject to German law. Jurisdiction is, to the extent legally permissible, the seat of our company.

terms.note: Note: These Terms of Use may be updated as needed. Significant changes will be notified to you by email.
